fw.name: DNBHumanModelingInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: SWKAnthro
class.abstract: This interface manages the anthropometry of the manikin.

method.name: GetVariableAtIndex
method.abstract: Returns the variable at the specified index.

method.name: GetVariableFromUsNumber
method.abstract: Returns the variable from a specified us number.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Reset the anthtropometry.

method.name: ConstructionType
method.abstract: Return or sets the construction type of the manikin.

method.name: Gender
method.abstract: Returns or sets the gender of the manikin.

method.name: InterpolationMethod
method.abstract: Returns or sets the interpolation.

method.name: LimitBound
method.abstract: Returns or sets the population accommodation, in terms of a limit bound.

method.name: NumberOfVariables
method.abstract: Returns the number of variables contained in this anthropometry.

method.name: Population
method.abstract: Return or sets the Population of the manikin.

method.name: PopulationAccommodation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the population accommodation.

class.name: SWKAnthroVariable
class.abstract: This interface is used to access an anthropometric variable.

method.name: GetCorrelationWith
method.abstract: Returns the correlation between this variable and another.

method.name: FullName
method.abstract: Returns the full name of the variable.

method.name: Manual
method.abstract: Returns or sets the management of the variable.

method.name: MaxValue
method.abstract: Returns the highest value that the variable can take.

method.name: Mean
method.abstract: Returns the mean value os the variable.

method.name: MinValue
method.abstract: Returns the lowest value that the variable can take.

method.name: ReferenceNumber
method.abstract: Returns the reference number of the variable.

method.name: StdDev
method.abstract: Returns the standard deviation of the variable.

method.name: Value
method.abstract: Returns or sets the value of the variable.

method.name: ValueAsPercentile
method.abstract: Returns or sets the value of the variable.

method.name: ValueAsString
method.abstract: Returns or sets the value of the variable, as a string.

class.name: SWKBody
class.abstract: This interface represents the body of the manikin.

method.name: ApplyPosition
method.abstract: Sets a new relative manikin position.

method.name: GetSegment
method.abstract: Returns a specific segment of the body, based on an index.

method.name: ResetAngularLimitations
method.abstract: Resets the angular limitations depending on the param piReset: 0 -> 2 OR 3 OR 4 depending of the first encountered.

method.name: ResetAttaches
method.abstract: Reset the attaches of the body.

method.name: ResetIKOffsets
method.abstract: Reset the offsets of the body.

method.name: ResetPosture
method.abstract: Set the manikin to the default (standing) posture.

method.name: ResetPrefAngles
method.abstract: Reset the pref angles of the body.

method.name: SetPosition
method.abstract: Sets a new absolute manikin position.

method.name: SetPosture
method.abstract: Set the manikin to a specific predefined posture.

method.name: SetToBestPosture
method.abstract: Set the manikin to the posture that will provide it its maximum score.

method.name: SwapAngularLimitations
method.abstract: Swap the angular limitations of the body.

method.name: SwapPosture
method.abstract: Swap the posture with the equivalent segment, on the other side of the manikin.

method.name: SwapPrefAngles
method.abstract: Swap the preferred angles of the body.

method.name: CenterOfGravity
method.abstract: Returns the center of gravity of the current manikin.

method.name: CenterOfGravityDisplayed
method.abstract: Returns or sets the display of the center of gravity.

method.name: CentralConeDisplayed
method.abstract: Returns or sets the central cone display of the active line of sight.

method.name: ConeTypeBoundedCone
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cone type display to bounded cone for the peripheral and central cone.

method.name: ConeTypeBoundings
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cone type display to boundings for the peripheral and central cone.

method.name: ConeTypeFlat
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cone type display to flat for the peripheral and central cone.

method.name: ConeTypeSpherical
method.abstract: Returns or sets the cone type display to spherical for the peripheral and central cone.

method.name: EllipsesDisplayed
method.abstract: Returns or sets the display of the manikin ellipses.

method.name: LineOfSightDisplayed
method.abstract: Returns or sets the display of the active line of sight.

method.name: Memo
method.abstract: Returns or records miscellaneous user-added comments about the posture.

method.name: NumberOfSegments
method.abstract: Returns the number of segments of the body.

method.name: PeripheralConeDisplayed
method.abstract: Returns or sets the peripheral cone display of the active line of sight.

method.name: Referential
method.abstract: Returns or sets the referential of the manikin.

method.name: ReferentialDisplayed
method.abstract: Returns or sets the display of the referential.

method.name: SegmentsDisplayed
method.abstract: Returns or sets the display of the segments.

method.name: SkinDisplayed
method.abstract: Returns or sets the display of the manikin surfaces (skin).

method.name: SkinResolution
method.abstract: Returns or sets the manikin skin resolution.

class.name: SWKBodyElement
class.abstract: This interface is used to access a body element (segment, ellipse, .

method.name: GetGlobalPosition
method.abstract: Returns the global position ofthe body element.

method.name: Refresh3D
method.abstract: Refreshes the 3D representation of the current element.

method.name: FullName
method.abstract: Returns the full name of the body element.

method.name: Manikin
method.abstract: Returns the manikin which owns this body element.

method.name: PositionX
method.abstract: Returns the x coordinate of the position of the body element.

method.name: PositionY
method.abstract: Returns the y coordinate of the position of the body element.

method.name: PositionZ
method.abstract: Returns the z coordinate of the position of the body element.

method.name: RefreshDisplay
method.abstract:
Enables or disables the update of the display during the script
replay.

class.name: SWKCenterOfGravity
class.abstract: This interface represents the center of gravity of the manikin.

class.name: SWKDOF
class.abstract: This interface deals with a degree of freedom (DOF) of a manikin.

method.name: ResetValue
method.abstract: Sets the value of the DOF to its default value.

method.name: SetLimitsToMatchBestPrefAngle
method.abstract: Set the angular limitations to match with the best pref angle.

method.name: DefaultValue
method.abstract: Returns the default value of a DOF.

method.name: FullName
method.abstract: Returns the full name of the degree of freedom (e.

method.name: LimitsLocked
method.abstract: Sets a lock on the limits.

method.name: MaxMean
method.abstract: Returns the mean value of the upper limit of the DOF (in radians).

method.name: MaxScore
method.abstract: Returns the highest score that this DOF can take.

method.name: MaxStdDev
method.abstract: Returns the standard deviation value of the upper limit of the DOF (in radians).

method.name: MaxValue
method.abstract: Returns or sets the highest value that a DOF can take.

method.name: MaxValueAsPercentile
method.abstract: Returns or sets the highest value that a DOF can take.

method.name: MinMean
method.abstract: Returns the mean value of the lower limit of the DOF (in radians).

method.name: MinStdDev
method.abstract: Returns the standard deviation value of the lower limit of the DOF (in radians).

method.name: MinValue
method.abstract: Returns or sets the lowest value that a DOF can take.

method.name: MinValueAsPercentile
method.abstract: Returns or sets the lowest value that a DOF can take.

method.name: Number
method.abstract: Returns the number of the DOF.

method.name: Score
method.abstract: Returns the score corresponding to the DOF's current value.

method.name: Value
method.abstract: Returns or sets the value of a DOF.

method.name: ValueAsString
method.abstract: Returns or sets the value of a DOF, as a string.

method.name: ValueLocked
method.abstract: Sets a lock on the value.

class.name: SWKErgo
class.abstract: This interface groups the properties giving access to all the ergonomic studies that can be performed on a manikin.

method.name: Carry
method.abstract: Returns the object for a carry analysis.

method.name: LiftLower
method.abstract: Returns the object for a lift/lower analysis.

method.name: PushPull
method.abstract: Returns the object for a push/pull analysis.

method.name: RULA
method.abstract: Returns the object for a RULA analysis.

class.name: SWKErgoCarry
class.abstract: This interface deals the carry ergonomic analysis.

method.name: DistanceOfCarry
method.abstract: Returns or sets the distance of carry.

method.name: Frequency
method.abstract: Returns or sets the carry frequecy.

method.name: MaximumWeight
method.abstract: This field is the maximum weight that can be carried force, given the current input guidelines.

method.name: Population
method.abstract: Returns or sets the percentage of the population that should be able to perform the carry task safely.

class.name: SWKErgoLiftLower
class.abstract: This interface deals the lift/lower ergonomic analysis.

method.name: SaveFinalPosture
method.abstract: Saves the current posture of the mankin as the final posture for the lift/lower analysis.

method.name: SaveInitialPosture
method.abstract: Saves the current posture of the mankin as the initial posture for the lift/lower analysis.

method.name: Coupling
method.abstract: Returns or sets the coupling condition for the lift/lower analysis.

method.name: Duration
method.abstract: Returns or sets the lift duration.

method.name: Frequency
method.abstract: Returns or sets the lift frequecy.

method.name: GuideLine
method.abstract: Returns or sets the guideline for the lift/lower analysis.

method.name: NIOSH_ActionLimit
method.abstract:
This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1981 analysis only
.

method.name: NIOSH_AngleOfAsymmetryFinal
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_AngleOfAsymmetryInitial
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_AsymmetricMultiplierFinal
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_AsymmetricMultiplierInitial
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_CouplingMultiplierFinal
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_CouplingMultiplierInitial
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_DistanceMultiplier
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_FrequencyMultiplier
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_HorizontalLocationFinal
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_HorizontalLocationInitial
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_HorizontalMultiplierFinal
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_HorizontalMultiplierInitial
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_LIFinal
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_LIInitial
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_LoadConstant
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_MaximumPermLimit
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1981 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_RWLFinal
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_RWLInitial
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_TravelDistance
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_VerticalLocationFinal
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_VerticalLocationInitial
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_VerticalMultiplierFinal
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: NIOSH_VerticalMultiplierInitial
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the NIOSH 1991 analysis only.

method.name: ObjectWeight
method.abstract: Returns or sets the weight of the object being lifted.

method.name: Population
method.abstract: Returns or sets the percentage of the population that should be able to perform the lift/lower task safely.

method.name: Snook_MaximumWeight
method.abstract: This field is set to a valid value for the Snook/Ciriello 1991 analysis only.

method.name: WarningMessage
method.abstract: Returnes an eventual warning message generated along with the study.

class.name: SWKErgoPushPull
class.abstract: This interface deals the push/pull ergonomic analysis.

method.name: DistanceOfPull
method.abstract: Returns or sets the distance of pull.

method.name: DistanceOfPush
method.abstract: Returns or sets the distance of push.

method.name: Frequency
method.abstract: Returns or sets the push/pull frequecy.

method.name: MaxInitialPullForce
method.abstract: This field is the maximum initial pulling force, produced by the study, given the current input guidelines.

method.name: MaxInitialPushForce
method.abstract: This field is the maximum initial pushing force, produced by the study, given the current input guidelines.

method.name: MaxSustainedPullForce
method.abstract: This field is the maximum sustained pulling force, produced by the study, given the current input guidelines.

method.name: MaxSustainedPushForce
method.abstract: This field is the maximum sustained pushing force, produced by the study, given the current input guidelines.

method.name: Population
method.abstract: Returns or sets the percentage of the population that should be able to perform the push/pull task safely.

class.name: SWKErgoRULA
class.abstract: This interface deals the RULA ergonomic analysis.

method.name: ArmAbducted
method.abstract: This property is True if the arm of the manikin is abducted, given the manikin's current posture.

method.name: ArmOutToSide
method.abstract: This property is True if the arm of the manikin is out to the side, given the manikin's current posture.

method.name: NeckSideBending
method.abstract: This property is True if the neck of the manikin is bent, given the manikin's current posture.

method.name: NeckTwisted
method.abstract: This property is True if the neck of the manikin is twisted, given the manikin's current posture.

method.name: ObjectWeight
method.abstract: Returns or sets the weight of the object being carried.

method.name: OverallScore
method.abstract: This field is the overall RULA score, given the manikin's current posture.

method.name: ShoulderRaised
method.abstract: This property is True if the shoulder of the manikin is raised, given the manikin's current posture.

method.name: TrunkSideBending
method.abstract: This property is True if the trunk of the manikin is bent, given the manikin's current posture.

method.name: TrunkTwisted
method.abstract: This property is True if the trunk of the manikin is twisted, given the manikin's current posture.

method.name: Verdict
method.abstract: This field gives a text string which represents the interpretaton of the overall RULA score.

method.name: WristBent
method.abstract: This property is True if the wrist of the manikin is bent, given the manikin's current posture.

method.name: WristTwisted
method.abstract: This property is True if the wrist of the manikin is twisted, given the manikin's current posture.

class.name: SWKIKConstraint
class.abstract: This interface manages the constraint of the manikin.

method.name: GetConstraintElement
method.abstract: Returns a reference to the target object of the constraint (if any).

method.name: GetEndEffector
method.abstract: Returns the end effector of the IK chain of the constraint.

method.name: GetStartSegment
method.abstract: Returns the start segment of the IK chain of the constraint.

method.name: GetTargetLine
method.abstract: Get the target points coordinates of a line This method retrieves the origin point coordinates as (x, y, z) data and the direction value of a line.

method.name: GetTargetPlane
method.abstract: Get the target points coordinates of a line This method retrieves the origin point coordinates as (x, y, z) data and the direction value of a line.

method.name: GetTargetPoint
method.abstract: Get the target point coordinates.

method.name: ResetTarget
method.abstract: Reset the offset of the target object (i.

method.name: SetConstraintElement
method.abstract: Set the target object to follow.

method.name: SetTargetLine
method.abstract: Set the target line to follow.

method.name: SetTargetPlane
method.abstract: Set the target plane to follow.

method.name: SetTargetPoint
method.abstract: Set the target point to follow.

method.name: Active
method.abstract: Returns or sets the constraint activity.

method.name: AngleCriteria
method.abstract: Returns or sets the angle criteria that will be used to evaluate success or failure of the constraint resolution.

method.name: AngleToTarget
method.abstract: Returns the angle (in radians) from the constraint end effector to the target.

method.name: DistanceCriteria
method.abstract: Returns or sets the distance criteria that will be used to evaluate success or failure of the constraint resolution.

method.name: DistanceToTarget
method.abstract: Returns the distance (in mm) from the constraint end effector to the target.

method.name: EndEffector
method.abstract: Returns or sets the end effector of the IK chain of the constraint.

method.name: Identifier
method.abstract: Returns the identifier(ID) of the constraint.

method.name: IsSuccess
method.abstract: Returns whether the resolution of this constraint is a success or a failure, given the current criteria.

method.name: Manikin
method.abstract: Returns the manikin which owns this IK constraint.

method.name: Priority
method.abstract: Returns or sets the priority of the constraint.

method.name: RotationOffsetAngle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the rotation offset angle for the 3D plane constraint.

method.name: StartSegment
method.abstract: Returns or sets the first segment of the body to be driven by this constraint.

method.name: TransferWithTarget
method.abstract: Returns or sets the Transfer With Target property.

method.name: UserType
method.abstract: Returns the user type of the constraint.

class.name: SWKIKManager
class.abstract: This interface represents the IK manager of the manikin.

method.name: AddConstraint
method.abstract: Add a constraint with the given end effector.

method.name: AddConstraintFrom
method.abstract: Add a new constraint identical to the one given.

method.name: GetConstraint
method.abstract: Returns the constraint at index piIndex.

method.name: RemoveAllConstraints
method.abstract: Remove all existing constraints on the manikin.

method.name: RemoveConstraint
method.abstract: Remove the given constraint.

method.name: Resolve
method.abstract:
Launch the IK solver to minimize the potential functions of
the constraints (i.e. reach all defined targets).

method.name: Behavior
method.abstract: Returns or sets the IK behaviors for this manikin.

method.name: Manikin
method.abstract: Returns the manikin which owns this IK manager.

method.name: NumberOfConstraints
method.abstract: Returns the total number of constraints on the manikin.

class.name: SWKLineOfSight
class.abstract: This interface deals with a line of sight of a manikin.

method.name: ApplyPosition
method.abstract: Applies a new relative position for the line of sight.

method.name: GetDOF
method.abstract: Returns a specific degree of freedom of the line of sight.

method.name: SetPosition
method.abstract: Sets a new absolute position for the line of sight.

method.name: Length
method.abstract: Returns the length of the line of sight, in centimeters.

method.name: NbDOFs
method.abstract: Returns the number of degrees of freedom on the current line of sight.

class.name: SWKLineOfSightNode
class.abstract: This interface characterizes a node.

method.name: LockPosture
method.abstract: Lock the posture of the line of sight for the dof piDOFId.

method.name: ResetAngularLimitations
method.abstract: Reset the angular limitations of the line of sight depending on piReset: 0 -> 2 OR 3 OR 4 depending of the first encountered.

method.name: ResetPosture
method.abstract: Reset the posture of the line of sight for the dof piDOFId.

method.name: ResetPrefAngles
method.abstract: Reset the preferred angles of the line of sight for the dof piDOFId.

class.name: SWKManikin
class.abstract: This interface groups the methods directly related to the definition of a manikin.

method.name: Anthro
method.abstract: Returns the anthropometry of the current manikin.

method.name: Body
method.abstract: Returns the body of the current manikin.

method.name: BodyNode
method.abstract: Returns the body node of the current manikin.

method.name: Ergo
method.abstract: Returns the ergonomic analysis of the current manikin.

method.name: IKManager
method.abstract: Returns the inverse kinematics (IK) engine of the current manikin.

method.name: LineOfSightNode
method.abstract: Returns the Line of sight node of the current manikin.

method.name: Move
method.abstract: Returns the manikin's move object.

method.name: ProfilesNode
method.abstract: Returns the Profiles node of the current manikin.

method.name: SettingsNode
method.abstract: Returns the settings node of the current manikin.

method.name: Vision
method.abstract: Returns the vision of the current manikin.

class.name: SWKManikinPart
class.abstract: This interface represents any part of the manikin that is persistent.

method.name: Memo
method.abstract: Returns or records miscellaneous user-added information about the part.

class.name: SWKNode
class.abstract: This interface characterizes a node.

class.name: SWKSegment
class.abstract: This interface deals with a segment of a manikin.

method.name: ApplyPosition
method.abstract: Applies a new relative position for the segment.

method.name: Attach
method.abstract: Attach a geometry to the segment.

method.name: CreateReachEnvelope
method.abstract: This method creates and displayed the reach envelope on the current segment.

method.name: DestroyReachEnvelope
method.abstract: This method destroys the reach envelope previously created for this segment.

method.name: Detach
method.abstract: Detach a geometry previously attached to the segment.

method.name: DetachAll
method.abstract: Detach all objects attached so far to the segment.

method.name: GetAttachedObject
method.abstract: Retrieve one object currently attached to the segment.

method.name: GetDOF
method.abstract: Returns a specific degree of freedom of the segment.

method.name: IsObjectReachable
method.abstract: Reachability check.

method.name: IsReachable
method.abstract: Reachability check.

method.name: LockPosture
method.abstract: Lock the posture of the segment.

method.name: MirrorCopyAngularLimitations
method.abstract: Mirror copy the angular limitations of the segment.

method.name: MirrorCopyPosture
method.abstract: Copy the posture on the equivalent segment, on the other side of the manikin.

method.name: MirrorCopyPrefAngles
method.abstract: Mirror copy the preferred angles of the segment.

method.name: RemoveLimits
method.abstract: Removes the angular limitations of the segment.

method.name: ResetAngularLimitations
method.abstract: Reset the angular limitations of the segment depending on piReset: 0 -> 2 OR 3 OR 4 depending of the first encountered.

method.name: ResetPosture
method.abstract: Set the segment's posture back to its default position.

method.name: ResetPrefAngles
method.abstract: Reset the preferred angles of the segment.

method.name: SetPosition
method.abstract: Sets a new absolute position for the segment.

method.name: SwapAngularLimitations
method.abstract: Swap the angular limitations of the segment.

method.name: SwapPosture
method.abstract: Swap the posture with the equivalent segment, on the other side of the manikin.

method.name: SwapPrefAngles
method.abstract: Swap the preferred angles of the segment.

method.name: AttachSize
method.abstract: Returns the number of objects currently attached to the segment.

method.name: EndPositionX
method.abstract: Returns the global x coordinate of the endpoint of the segment.

method.name: EndPositionY
method.abstract: Returns the global y coordinate of the endpoint of the segment.

method.name: EndPositionZ
method.abstract: Returns the global z coordinate of the endpoint of the segment.

method.name: IsDOFAt0
method.abstract: Returns True if there is a DOF at index 0, False otherwise.

method.name: IsDOFAt1
method.abstract: Returns True if there is a DOF at index 1, False otherwise.

method.name: IsDOFAt2
method.abstract: Returns True if there is a DOF at index 2, False otherwise.

method.name: IsOnHand
method.abstract: This property is True if this segment belongs to the manikin's hand.

method.name: IsOnLeftSide
method.abstract: This property is True if this segment is on the left side of the manikin.

method.name: IsOnRightSide
method.abstract: This property is True if this segment is on the right side of the manikin.

method.name: IsOnSpine
method.abstract: This property is True if this segment belongs to the manikin's spine.

method.name: Length
method.abstract: Returns the length of the segment, in centimeters.

method.name: MirrorSegment
method.abstract: This property returns the equivalent segment, but on the opposite side (ex.

method.name: NbDOFs
method.abstract: Returns the number of degrees of freedom on the current segment.

class.name: SWKSegmentNode
class.abstract: This interface characterizes a segment node.

method.name: GetSegment
method.abstract: Returns a specific child of the segment node, based on an index.

method.name: GetSegmentNode
method.abstract: Returns a specific child of the segment node, based on an index.

method.name: MirrorCopyPosture
method.abstract: Copy the posture on the equivalent segment node, on the other side of the manikin.

method.name: ResetPosture
method.abstract: Set the posture of all segment under this node back to their default position.

method.name: SwapPosture
method.abstract: Swap the posture with the equivalent segment node, on the other side of the manikin.

method.name: NbChildrenNodes
method.abstract: Returns the number of children segment nodes under this node.

method.name: NbChildrenSegments
method.abstract: Returns the number of children segments under this node.

class.name: SWKVision
class.abstract: This interface manages the vision of the manikin.

method.name: CloseVisionWindows
method.abstract: Closes all open vision windows relating to the manikin on which the function is called.

method.name: LookAt
method.abstract: Make the manikin look at the specified position in space.

method.name: LookAtPoint
method.abstract: Make the manikin look at the specified position in space.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets all attributes of the vision to their default values.

method.name: ActiveLineOfSight
method.abstract: Returns the active line of sight, according to the vision type.

method.name: ActiveSide
method.abstract: Returns the vision active side.

method.name: AmbinocularAngle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the vision Ambinocular angle.

method.name: BinocularAngle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the vision Binocular angle.

method.name: CentralConeAngle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the vision Central cone angle.

method.name: FocalDistance
method.abstract: Returns or sets the focal distance, in centimeters.

method.name: FocalPointX
method.abstract: Returns the x coordinate (in millimeters) of the focal point.

method.name: FocalPointY
method.abstract: Returns the y coordinate (in millimeters) of the focal point.

method.name: FocalPointZ
method.abstract: Returns the z coordinate (in millimeters) of the focal point.

method.name: MonocularAngle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the vision Monocular angle.

method.name: PonctumProximum
method.abstract: Returns or sets the ponctum proximum, in centimeters.

method.name: PonctumRemotum
method.abstract: Returns or sets the ponctum remotum, in centimeters.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns or sets the vision type.

method.name: VerticalBottomAngle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the vision Vertical Bottom angle.

method.name: VerticalTopAngle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the vision Vertical Top angle.
